title: Clock Watchdog Timeout Error
body:
Hi everyone, 

I have been dealing with an issue for several months now where my computer crashes upon trying to patch.  I can play the game fine from an external hard drive once I have installed a version that has already been patched.  I am really not sure what to do and would love any help that I can get.  Again it literally just freezes my entire computer upon starting up the client.

Thanks

replies.body: Hi. I've also been experiencing the exact same problem with my new build pc. Have you found any solutions yet?

If I understand correctly, you're able to play League from an external hard drive but not internally?  Where are you crashing exactly?  Is it your entire PC, or the game?  Where does it happen?  Any clarification can help!
What a great community! Full of so much help!

Sorry for missing your reply, though I was able to catch the notification this time.  It's not really possible to run League from an external drive or even usb, so the client will attempt to scan your game files and download them to your PC temporarily then go away.  It's really interesting that it works almost opposite in your case.  I'm also curious if there is some anti-virus or safety software blocking you from installing on your local drive.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work with you individually.  We'll reply back directly through there.

It literally just crashes (Entire Computer) when it starts to patch the game.  I checked my windows log and last records are:

The bootmgr spent 0 ms waiting for user input.
There are 0x1 boot options on this system.
The boot menu policy was 0x1.
The boot type was 0x0.
The last shutdown's success status was false. The last boot's success status was true.
'
The Virtualization Based Security (policies: 0) is disabled with status STATUS_SUCCESS.
The operating system started at system time ‎2017‎-‎01‎-‎27T19:45:55.495792400Z.

Yes, I am able to play off of an external hard drive, but not internally.  It crashes as soon as I start up the client and the patching process begins.  It crashes my entire PC and gives me the BSOD error Clock Watchdog Timeout.  I am running Windows 10.  

Thanks!
